title: Help with Cost of Living
description: Access financial support and advice for managing living costs.

sections.title: Energy Bills Support
sections.content: Find government schemes and grants to reduce your energy costs.

sections.title: Food Assistance
sections.content: Explore food banks and meal programs in your area to get essential groceries.

sections.title: Housing and Rent Help
sections.content: Check for housing benefits and rent relief programs available for you.
